task.title: How to Register and Prepare for a Fitness Assessment
task.shortdesc: If you have decided to complete a fitness assessment, you need to first register and pay online. There are also a few things you should keep in mind when preparing for your fitness assessment.

substep.cmd: Visit the online rec sports portal at and click on "olympic lifting and bod pod testing."
Click on the icon of the assessment you would like to complete. Then, click on "add to cart."
Click "checkout." When it asks you "are you sure?," click "checkout" again.
Fill out your payment information by following the online prompt.

step.cmd: Now, you need to make sure you are ready to complete the assessment.

substep.cmd: If you are male, wear compression shorts made of polyester and/or Lycra. A swim cap will be provided to you before the assessment. If you are female, wear either compression shorts and a wire-free sports bra or a bathing suit.
Do not eat or exercise two hours prior to the assessment, and make sure to use the restroom and remove all metal and jewelry before the assessment.
